Package org.jmeifert.camber.util

Class Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmeifert.camber.util.Format
  • public class Format
extends java.lang.Object
    Format provides functions related to string checking and sanitization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Format()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean isAlphaNumeric​(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if a string is alphanumeric (only contains A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and whitespace).
      static boolean isSafeAscii​(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if a string contains only safe ASCII characters (letters, numbers, special chars, newline).
      static boolean isValidMessage​(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if a string is a valid message (only safe ascii, not longer than max message length)
      static boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if a string is a valid name (only safe ascii, no newlines, not longer than max name length)
      static boolean isValidPasswordHash​(java.lang.String s)
      Checks if a password hash is valid (A-Za-z0-9, length is 64)

      • isAlphaNumeric

        public static boolean isAlphaNumeric​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a string is alphanumeric (only contains A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and whitespace). Helpful for simple sanitization.
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string is alphanumeric.

      • isSafeAscii

        public static boolean isSafeAscii​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a string contains only safe ASCII characters (letters, numbers, special chars, newline).
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string is safe ASCII

      • isValidMessage

        public static boolean isValidMessage​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a string is a valid message (only safe ascii, not longer than max message length)
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string is a valid message

      • isValidName

        public static boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a string is a valid name (only safe ascii, no newlines, not longer than max name length)
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string is a valid name

      • isValidPasswordHash

        public static boolean isValidPasswordHash​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if a password hash is valid (A-Za-z0-9, length is 64)
        Parameters:
        s - Password hash to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string is a valid password hash
